title: The Coastguard
creator_credit: Simon Campbell-Jones, Michael Barden and R.H.R. Productions
brief_description: The film was made for the 150th anniversary of the founding of H.M. Coastguard. It shows the work carried out by the Coastguard Service in saving life at sea and on the coast, both directly and through their co-ordination with R.A.F. Navy, Post Office and R.N.L.I.
creator_credit_for_label: Simon Campbell-Jones, Michael Barden and R.H.R. Productions
